turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello, how can i assist you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello. I'd like a cinnamon dolce latte with whole milk and whipped cream, and I would like Let's go with a tall.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sorry, can you order that a little bit slowly? what kind of coffee would you like?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure. Do you have any milk preference?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so i have a a tall cinnamon dolce latte, with whole milk and whipped cream. Did i get that right?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great. Where would you like to pick it up?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your're all set. Your coffee will be ready for pickup soon at the starbucks in eerie pennsylvania.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you're very welcome. Your receipt will be sent to you via text message.
